Any ideas?

EMF is attempting to load the org.eclipse.xsd plug-in to parse an XSD referenced by the XML document being loaded. When the plug-in is not present, the stack trace is logged and printed, but XML parsing continues, but without the benefit of the XSD.

The easiest way to remove log entry is to install the org.eclise.xsd plug-in.

Resolving this as INVALID. If the behavior of EMF in this case is undesirable, we will have to open a defect on EMF itself.
